code: public boolean matches(Exchange exchange) {     String body = exchange.getIn().getBody(String.class).     bodies.add(body).     return !"secret".equals(body). }

@Test public void testCBRCustomPredicateAsFilter() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:good").expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World", "Bye World").     getMockEndpoint("mock:secret").expectedBodiesReceived("secret").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "secret").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Bye World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     assertEquals("Hello World", filter.getBodies().get(0)).     assertEquals("secret", filter.getBodies().get(1)).     assertEquals("Bye World", filter.getBodies().get(2)). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").choice().when(filter).to("mock:good").otherwise().to("mock:secret").         }     }. }
